methods.name: closeDialog
methods.description: Closes currently opened dialogs

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: customizeDialog
methods.description: Customizes the user's dialog

params.description:
The type of dialog to customize. If you set as null, the config will be applied to all dialogs. Options are:
  • record-create
  • record-delete
  • record-info
  • record-update
  • view-error
  • view-info
  • view-success
  • view-warn
  • zg-version
params.name: type

params.description:
Options for the data retrieval. Options are:
  • cancel: Text for the Cancel Button
  • confirm: Text for the Confirm Button
  • title: The Title to display on the Dialog
params.name: config

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: getData
methods.description: Fetches the internal property referencing the dataset for the grid
displayValues: { csv: true, headers: true, col: "all or visible", rows: "all or visible" }

params.description:
Optional, options for the data retrieval. Options are:
  • csv: Boolean indicating if it should be sent as a csv string. Default is false.
  • headers: Boolean indicating if headers should be included. Default is false. Only applies to csv or JSON array of arrays as JSON objects have a key already.
  • cols: String indicating if we should return all columns or only visible. 'all' or 'visible' are options.
  • rows: String indicating if we should return all rows or only filtered/searched. 'all' or 'visible' are options.
params.name: config

returns.description: The dataset.

params.name: value

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: getTheme
methods.description: Gets the value of the `theme` attribute

returns.description: Value of attribute

methods.name: setTheme
methods.description: Sets the `theme` attribute

params.description: Value to indicate which theme to set
params.name: theme

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: getViewportStop

methods.name: getViewportTypes

methods.name: setViewportStop

methods.name: setCardTemplate
methods.description: Sets the id to reference an external `template` to be used as `<zg-card>`

params.description: Value of id to use the card template.
params.name: id

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together
